${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:InsidersMap.NAME: Insider's Map
${modID}:InsidersMap.FLAVOR: Residents of the Spire sure have benefits.
DESCRIPTIONS: When choosing a path, you can travel backwards if the path is unexplored.
